Articles.Content:
Hello,

I want, for a project, write the telemetry data of a rocket into a file to read it later and import it to an Excel sheet and to SciLab. The data I want to record should be altitude, orbital speed, acceleration, engine thrust and vessel mass. The rest, I can calculate (even it's a little bit of work).

Is there a mod/add-on that lets me do that?

I have MechJeb installed and if I could get all three Orbit, Surface, and Vessel Info windows that would be all that I need (except for engine thrust).
VOID by toadicus has a CSV data logger. He's in the process of cleaning it up and making it more functional at the moment. I'm sure he wouldn't mind another person prodding him
